faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What is included in a serviced apartment?
faq.a1: All Amanthos Living apartments include a fully equipped kitchen with appliances and cookware, free high-speed Wi-Fi, Smart TV, regular professional cleaning with linen changes, and digital check-in with keyless entry. Depending on the location, you may also have access to parking, air conditioning, and stunning views.
faq.q2: How much cheaper are you vs hotels?
faq.a2: Our serviced apartments typically cost 50% less than equivalent hotel rooms in the same area, while offering 2-3x more space with a full kitchen, laundry, and all amenities included. Use our booking search to see real-time rates for your dates.
faq.a3: We offer fully digital, self-service check-in. Before your arrival, you'll receive detailed access instructions via email, including your digital key code. There's no need to coordinate with anyone or wait at a reception. Simply arrive and let yourself in.
faq.a4: We offer two rate types: Refundable rates allow free cancellation up to the specified deadline (usually 24-48 hours before check-in). Non-Refundable rates offer the best price but cannot be cancelled or modified. You can choose your preferred rate type during booking.
faq.a5: Yes, parking is available at all three locations. At Zurich Airport, private parking is available for CHF 10/day. At Solothurn and Nyon, on-site parking options are available. Please check the specific location page for details.
faq.q6: Can I book for business travel?
faq.a6: Absolutely! Our apartments are ideal for business travelers. Every unit includes a dedicated workspace, high-speed Wi-Fi suitable for video conferencing, and a fully equipped kitchen. We can provide invoices for company expense reporting.
